titleStmt.title: A satyre dedicated to His most excellent Maiestie. By George VVither, Gentleman.
titleStmt.author: Wither, George, 1588-1667.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by Thomas Snodham] for George Norton, and are to be solde at the signe of the red-Bull, neere Temple-barre,

notesStmt.note: The first two leaves are blank except for signature-marks; the last leaf is blank.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
